chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has the above issue:
The selfie camera is no longer working.
Thank you for your help,

Hello Juergen, You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will handle your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby return location. You can find a list of locations here: Before you prepare your return, please follow these steps: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item here 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product 3. Remove any existing protective wrapping or film 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below How to package your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product placed inside so it won't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a backup label inside in case the original one is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before sending it. This protects you in case your product is damaged during transit. Your return is now ready for pickup! We'll notify you when it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt mit iCloud/Google verknüpft.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device is currently locked by the customer's iCloud account. Inform the customer to unlink their account or we will not be able to proceed with the repair. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased as an EXCELLENT condition. According to the Quality Charter, EXCELLENT condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the shell. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €60 deduction will be made in the event our repair team is unable to fix the device. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

We inform the customer that the iCloud account is active.

The customer wants it repaired because he says the Selfie Camera doesn't work properly. 

Regards,
Libania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,


Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
